channel.title: [508] Adding Object To A Palidino 76 [508]
channel.description:
Difficulty 1/10 Copying And Changing A Code 1) Go to src\palidino76\rs2\player 2) Open Player.java 3) Then search for (Ctrl + F) frames.createGlobalObject 4) After that you will find something like this:
frames.createGlobalObject(7288, 0, 3083, 3514, 0, 10); //portal at 3090,3512 home
The 7288 is the object id, the 3083 and 3514 is the coords the 10 is needed on the end as it is a ground item. Copy and paste this code:
frames.createGlobalObject(7288, 0, 3083, 3514, 0, 10); //portal at 3090,3512 home
That will create a portal at Edgeville Although this wont teleport you anywhere as you need to add a code in ObjectOption1 which I will do in my next tutorial. :D

item.title: [508] Adding Object To A Palidino 76 [508]
item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

Difficulty 1/10
Copying And Changing A Code

  1. Go to src\palidino76\rs2\player
  2. Open Player.java
  3. Then search for (Ctrl + F) frames.createGlobalObject
  4. After that you will find something like this:
frames.createGlobalObject(7288, 0, 3083, 3514, 0, 10); //portal at 3090,3512 home

The 7288 is the object id, the 3083 and 3514 is the coords the 10 is needed on the end as it is a ground item.

Copy and paste this code:

frames.createGlobalObject(7288, 0, 3083, 3514, 0, 10); //portal at 3090,3512 home
That will create a portal at Edgeville Although this wont teleport you anywhere as you need to add a code in ObjectOption1 which I will do in my next tutorial.
